title: Disk full issue with NFS server
content:
Your NFS server may run into a disk full issue after the suite has been running for a period of time.

Cause

The log files in the suite NFS server's <global NFS root folder>/logs directory keep growing as the suite is running.

Solution

You can remove or archive the log files in this directory without the need to stop the suite system. For details, see Optimize log space utilization of the NFS volume.
